description: macOS-only AppleScript control for the ChatGPT Atlas desktop app. Use only when the user explicitly asks to control Atlas tabs/bookmarks/history on macOS and the \"ChatGPT Atlas\" app is installed; do not trigger for general browser tasks or non-macOS environments.
key_workflows: List tabs to get window_id and tab_index:
Focus a tab using the window_id and tab_index from the listing:

reference_topics.summary: Atlas stores Chromium-style profile data under: - `~/Library/Application Support/com.openai.atlas/browser-data/host/Local State` - Profiles under: `~/Library/Application Support/com.openai.atlas/browser-data/host/<profile>`
